name: Decor Wreckers
overview: Here's a fast-paced arcade game that may well drive you crackers'. Your task is simple enough - to paint the screen solid with your nippy paint roller. But beware of the numerous interlopers along the way - Sid Spider, Freddie Fly, Bertle Bug and Sammy Snail all want to get in on the act und will certainly try to spoll your finish.
